contextId.information: In the vision given to Isaiah, Yahweh speaks to the armies of Elam and Media as if they are there listening to him. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_apostrophe]])
contextId.quote: Go up and attack, Elam; besiege, Media

contextId.information: Here Isaiah speaks various parts of creation as if they were people and commands them to praise Yawheh. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_apostrophe]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
contextId.quote: Sing, you heavens ... glory in Israel

contextId.information: Here Yahweh speaks to the city of Jerusalem as if it were listening to him. Here Jerusalem represents the people who live there. AT: "You afflicted people of Jerusalem" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_apostrophe]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
